---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---




```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

adae <- read_csv("https://rhoinc.github.io/data-library/data/clinical-trials/adam/adae.csv")
adae

p <- ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = AESEV, y = AGE) +
  geom_boxplot(shape = "circle", fill = "#112446") +
  theme_minimal()
ggplotly(p)
```
